snippet: After meeting in Jerusalem, Israeli and Palestinian negotiators will hold another session in Jericho on the West Bank.
abstract: Israeli and Palestinian negotiators will resume peace talks in Jerusalem and plan to hold another session in Jericho on West Bank; goal is to reach comprehensive peace agreement within nine months that will lead to independent Palestinian state.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: After meeting in Jerusalem, Israeli and Palestinian negotiators will hold another session in Jericho on the West Bank.

headline.main: Peace Talks to Resume in Jerusalem Next Week, State Dept. Says
headline.print_headline: Peace Talks to Resume in Jerusalem Next Week, State Dept. Says
